import React from "react"; import CommonBanner from "../../common/banner/CommonBanner"; import Footer from "../../common/footer/Footer"; import Header from "../../common/header/Header"; import InfoSection from "../../common/infoSection/InfoSection"; class Training extends React.Component { render() { return ( <>
Trainings

BrainHR is a leading global talent development corporation offering training and development solutions to individuals, institutions, and corporate clients. We offer training through various modes such as Online Instructor-led Training, Self-paced Learning, Classroom Training, and Blended Learning. NIIT also offers customized training solutions for corporate clients to meet their specific business needs. At BrainHR IT Solutions, we understand the importance of staying up-to-date with the latest technology trends and best practices for IT professionals engaged with various Clients and those who want to make their mark and niche in their careers. That's why we offer a wide range of IT technology training and certification courses to help our consultants to stay ahead of the curve and remain competitive in their industries.

BrainHR provides a comprehensive range of training courses covering various topics in IT. These courses include programming languages such as Java, .Net, Front End, MEAN, LEAN, and Full Stack, as well as specialized courses in Python, AWS, PEGA, Devops, SAP, QA, Salesforce, Cloud Computing, Mobile Application Development, Cyber Security, Data Analytics, Automation & AI, Machine Learning, Robotics & RPA, ERP, CRM, CMS, Embedded Systems, Scrum, and PMP certifications. These courses are designed to cater to different skill levels, from beginner to advanced, and are taught by experienced trainers with extensive knowledge and expertise in their respective fields. BrainHR's training courses use a variety of tools, software, frameworks, and methodologies to ensure that learners gain practical, hands-on experience and can apply their new skills in real-world scenarios.{" "}

We offer both in-person and online training options to accommodate our clients' busy schedules. Our training programs are designed to equip our clients' employees with the knowledge and skills they need to stay competitive in their field. We offer customized training programs that cater to our clients' specific needs and requirements. Our training programs are tailored to the specific needs of our clients and consultants, with a focus on practical, hands-on learning. We work closely with our clients to understand their training requirements and customize our programs accordingly. Our trainers are industry experts with extensive experience in their respective fields, ensuring that our clients receive the highest quality training. We provide Online Training, Classroom Training, One to One Training and Customized Training. Our trainers work closely with clients to develop a customized training plan that meets their specific needs and requirements.{" "}

Our online training programs are designed to be flexible and convenient, allowing participants to learn at their own pace and from anywhere in the world. Our classroom training programs are held in a comfortable and conducive learning environment, allowing participants to interact with the trainer and their peers in person. Our one-to-one training programs provide personalized attention and are tailored to the individual needs of each participant. Our customized training programs are designed to meet the specific requirements of an organization, including the training content, delivery method, and schedule. Overall, our training programs aim to provide practical, hands-on learning and to equip our clients and consultants with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in their fields.

At BrainHR, we understand that every client has unique training requirements based on their business needs and goals. Hence, we offer customized training programs that cater to specific needs. Our training programs are designed to provide practical and hands-on learning experiences, giving our clients and consultants the knowledge and skills required to excel in their roles. We work closely with our clients to understand their training needs and design a curriculum that is relevant to their business objectives. Our trainers are industry experts with extensive experience in their respective fields, ensuring that our clients receive the highest quality training. We provide personalized attention to each participant, ensuring that they understand the concepts thoroughly and can apply them in real-world scenarios.

At BrainHR, we focus on providing hands-on training to our candidates through various methodologies such as Pair Programming, Team Programming, and Live Project scenarios. Pair Programming is a technique where two programmers work together on the same project, sharing a keyboard and a computer. This approach enables candidates to learn from their peers and solve problems collaboratively. Team Programming involves working in a team environment with multiple developers, simulating a real-world project setting. This approach allows candidates to learn how to collaborate, communicate effectively, and handle different challenges that arise during a project's lifecycle.

We provide Live Project scenarios to candidates to accustom with practical exposure to real-world projects. We provide candidates with the opportunity to work on live projects, from requirement gathering to project deployment. This approach helps candidates understand the project lifecycle and equips them with the necessary skills to be industry-ready even before they join a project. Our training programs also include sessions on soft skills, communication, and leadership development, which are essential for success in the IT industry. By combining practical training with soft skill development, we ensure that our candidates are well-rounded and ready to take on the challenges of the industry.

In Summary, The benefits of leveraging BrainHR for IT training are:

  1. Customized training programs: BrainHR offers tailored training programs based on the specific needs of clients and consultants.
  2. Hands-on learning: The training programs at BrainHR focus on practical, hands-on learning through activities such as pair programming, team programming, and live project scenarios.
  3. Experienced trainers: BrainHR's trainers are industry experts with extensive experience in their respective fields, ensuring high-quality training for clients.
  4. Industry readiness: BrainHR's training programs are designed to make candidates industry-ready even before they join a project, which can save time and resources for clients.
  5. Competitive advantage: By investing in training through BrainHR, clients can gain a competitive advantage in the marketplace by having skilled and knowledgeable staff.

The global e-learning market size is projected to reach USD 374.3 billion by 2026, growing at a CAGR of 9.1% from 2021 to 2026 and 87% of organizations worldwide say their employees’ skills gaps are impacting business performance. This highlights the need for organizations to invest in training and development to bridge these gaps. In a survey conducted by Udemy, 60% of employees said they would stay longer at a company that invested in their career development. This shows that investing in employee training can increase retention rates. A report by McKinsey found that skill-building is seven times more effective than hiring for filling skill gaps. This shows that companies can benefit from upskilling their existing employees rather than hiring new ones and 67% of workers say that training and development opportunities are a very important factor in their decision to accept or reject a job offer. This highlights the importance of offering training programs to attract top talent.

As per the LinkedIn Learning 2021 Workplace Learning Report, 70% of employees say that training and development opportunities influence their decision to stay with a company. This statistic emphasizes the need for companies to invest in their employees' training and development to retain top talent. According to a study by Training Industry, the global training market was valued at $355 billion in 2020, with online learning accounting for the majority of the market share. BrainHR can be a valuable partner for organizations looking to provide training and upskilling opportunities to their employees. With its tailored and practical training programs, BrainHR can help companies bridge skill gaps and create a skilled workforce. Moreover, BrainHR's focus on pair programming, team programming, and live project scenarios can provide a hands-on experience to candidates, making them industry-ready and more attractive to potential employers.With our IT technology training services, we are well-positioned to tap into this growing market and help individuals and organizations stay ahead of the curve in the rapidly evolving world of technology.
